      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void disconnect()
      Disconnect from the robot, finalizing any ongoing instructions.
      void hover()
      Instructs the drone to stop and hover in midair.

      Instructs the drone to perform emergency recovery (often the same as DroneInterface.sendLanding()).

      Instructs the drone to land.
      void sendTakeoff()
      Instructs the drone to take off.

      • setControlInput

        public void setControlInput(double yaw,
                            double pitch,
                            double roll,
                            double gaz)
        Description copied from interface: DroneInterface
        Sends the yaw, pitch, roll, and gaz values for the drone to match.
        Specified by:
        setControlInput in interface DroneInterface
        Parameters:
        yaw - the rotation about the vertical axis, in the range [-1, 1]
        pitch - the angle of the nose of the drone, in the range [-1, 1]
        roll - the angle of the left and right sides of the drone, in the range [-1, 1]
        gaz - the vertical velocity of the drone, in the range [-1, 1]
